testcase.name: To verify if result displayed is as per the entered data
To verify if system is suggesting a keyword relevant to entered data
testcase.system-out: Given Relevant data.........................................................passed When As user enters the data in search text bar.............................passed Then System should suggest some keywords relevant to entered data...........passed

testcase.name: To verify if user is able to enter the data with 2 characters

testcase.system-out: Given Search box is enabled.................................................passed When User enters a data in search bar.......................................passed And Click on search.........................................................passed Then Search advanced must be visible........................................passed
